overview: Everybody knows that bad girls have more fun, and the Digital Playground girls are the baddest on the block. Robby D. provides fans with a third round of kinky gonzo action! Contract stars Jesse Jane and Riley Steele are naughty and begging to be punished. Evan gives Jesse the fucking of her life, while Danny serves Riley a plowing for the books. You wanted it ... and now you've got it!
tagline: Good girls go to heaven. Bad girls are heaven.
title: Bad Girls 3
